title: Statement using random numbers - describe behavior

content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the behavior of the statement?

choices.label: It generates a random integer between  6  and  15,  inclusive, and assigns it to r.
It generates a random integer between  6  and  16,  inclusive, and assigns it to r.
It generates a random integer between  10  and  15,  inclusive, and assigns it to r.
It generates a random integer between  10  and  16,  inclusive, and assigns it to r.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
